name: Maurilio Morais
headline: Software Engineer
summary: I was never in a hurry to 'get there'. I’ve always preferred to understand the journey. Software Engineer and student of Computer Engineering and Systems Analysis and Development. I work with platform development, Front-end in Angular, Back-end with AWS, Agent and AI integrations, data, automations, and ServiceNow. I like solving problems. If something doesn’t exist, I try to create it. If it doesn’t work, I try to understand it. If no one has solved it yet, I at least try to be the one who will.

responsibilities: Development of AI orchestration platform focused on code quality and best practices
Active participation in both front-end and back-end ensuring consistency across layers
Designing AWS architectures to create scalable and resilient systems
Development and maintenance of automated tests (unit and integration)
Development of AWS API Gateway and Lambdas
Implementation of event integrations with ServiceNow
Creation of new event sources improving correlation and standardization of Incidents
Integration of Service Portal with AI for BCP analysis
Democratization of critical data tables facilitating analysis and access
Asset and CMDB management ensuring control and traceability
Improved performance of Scheduled Jobs by over 80%
Development of Service Portal for CMDB management
Development of self-service catalogs saving over 5,000 operational hours
Implementation of automations in PowerShell and Shell Script in on-premises environments
Development of internal portals using Django and ReactJS
